cause.description:
For over 65 years the USO has been supporting our troops and their families.
They provide anything from entertainment to lift morale, to emergency aid for spouses in a desperate situation.
They proudly serve those who serve us, and you can take part in it by recruiting more people and donating. For more information, or to make a personal donation go to: www.uso.org
1. Lift morale of the troops through entertainment.
2. Provide support, supplies, and comfort to military members and their families.
3. Be there in case of an emergency for troops and their families.
cause.mission: support US military members and their families no matter where they serve.
cause.name: USO- Proudly serving the men and women who serve our country
